To execute the same command in multiple panes

with multiple panes in a single window, type the following sequence: ctrl + <prefix-key> setw synchronize-panes on

and now whatever you type in one of the panes, will be populated in the others.

To switch this feature off, you can type the following sequence: ctrl + <prefix-key> setw synchronize-panes off

To swap 2 panes

<prefix-key> { or }

To cycle panes around

<prefix-key> ctl + o

To change the layout of panes

ctrl + <prefix-key> space

To move a pane to a new window

break-pane – or – <prefix-key> !
